sourceMeaningMnemonic: This <radical>canopy</radical> of <radical>tree</radical>s isn't actually a canopy of trees at all. When you look closely, you see these trees are actually giant stalks of <kanji>hemp</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Wow, these hemp plants are so big that they look like trees. But, despite their size they're still just hemp.
readingMnemonic: Who planted all this <kanji>hemp</kanji>? Your <reading>ma</reading>ma (<ja>ま</ja>) did.
readingInfo: Your mama knew that you were going to like hemp in the future, so she planted these hemp plants for you. What a great mama.
